desktop.title: Pricing
desktop.intro: Pair offers three simple pricing tiers for Free, Team, and Enterprise customers. For custom solutions of 100,000 Pair URLs or more, please contact customer@pairurl.com.

sections.content: 10 Pair Public URLs per month for $0.
1000 Pair Private URLs per month for $29 per user.
10,000 Pair Private URLs per month for $49 per user.
